properties.Name: BuyClass
properties.Description:
A category that distinguishes the purchasing decisions in the buying process.

There are typically three buy classes defined:

1.  Straight Rebuys - involving routine, repetitive purchases of products.

2.  Modified Rebuys - involving the procurement of new products that cost more or have new features of upgraded specifications.

3.  New Buys - which are new purchases

Columns.Name: BuyClassId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Buy Class.

Columns.Name: BuyClassName
Columns.Description: The name of the Buy Class.

Columns.Name: BuyClassDescription
Columns.Description: The description of the Buy Class.
